flavorText: "Many are in high place, and of renown: but mysteries are revealed unto the meek." —Ecclesiastes 3:19
name: Revelation
originalText: All players play with the cards in their hands face up on the table.

rulings.text: This has the supertype world. When a world permanent enters the battlefield, any world permanents that were already on the battlefield are put into their owners’ graveyards. This is a state-based action called the “world rule.” The new world permanent stays on the battlefield. If two world permanents enter the battlefield at the same time, they’re both put into their owners’ graveyards.

text: Players play with their hands revealed.
